Package documentclassifier

Class Summary
DocumentClassifierAboutBox  
DocumentClassifierApp Main class of the application
DocumentClassifierView This class represents the main frame of the application.
MapDefaultPreferences The purpose of this class is to mantain, in a structured and ordered way, two kinds of information for other classes of the program: 1 - The names of the various preferences 2 - Their corresponding default values In this way we add a level of abstraction for the other classes of the program, that need to use the static fields of this class to reference the names and/or default values of the various preferences.
PreferencesDialog This class represents the JDialog used to modify the program's preferences, such as - The scraper used to extract the features (terms) from documents.
